column4: Hey. I have an odd problem. I installed Ubuntu Netbook Remix on my netbook. I then installed xubuntu-desktop to get xfce. But when I log in to xfce I still get the desktop menu thing that gnome has
I want to get rid of that desktop menu
dunno if thats the right thing to do, but you can try uninstalling gnome-desktop, might also remove all gnome-related stuff
I think I'll not do that. Want to keep some of the programs. But I figured it out. I entered the xcfe settings editor and removed the netbook menu from the start-up apps.
